results.name: My first ever game(Project Top Down)
Set the world on fire PROTOTYPE
Simple Rube Goldberg Machine with Some Dominos
Your girlfriend bought your favorite cookie crisp cereal but forgot to get milk.

  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10, 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 960, AMD 460
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
